ygData.subject: High levels need to quit camping at the Kithicor zone points
ygData.msgSnippet: Kithicor is great now, but the high level people hunting there need to keep the really bad stuff away from the zone points. (The server I was on last night had
ygData.messageBody:
Kithicor is great now, but the high level people hunting there need to keep
the really bad stuff away from the zone points. (The server I was on last
night had 20 people camping at the zone, killing the things) Nothing like
zoning into a (Zlixx thul hits you for 137 damage) message. Even during the
day. Great when you are travelling. lol. I feel sorry for those lower than
level 15. IF you are going to hunt Kithicor, be courteous and do it far
enough away from the zone so that travelers do not get caught in fight.

-Martyn
Mithaniel Marr
